"I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications," David Cameron said in a statement. Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government. Andy Coulson is a trusted aide and his departure is a blow to David Cameron , whose office had long insisted he would stay on despite the scandal. I would like to work more on my personal passions. There will be several new products I'm working on. I've been accused of vaporware recently, so I won't talk about them yet. But soon.
